quarks.connectors.runtime

Class IdleManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • quarks.connectors.runtime.IdleManager

  • public class IdleManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manager to auto-disconnect a connector when idle and subsequently auto-reconnect it.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      To be called when the connector is being permanently closed.
      void connected()
      To be called when the connector has become connected.
      void disconnected(boolean wasIdle)
      To be called when the connector has become disconnected.
      protected org.slf4j.Logger getLogger() 
      void notIdle()
      A "not idle" event has occurred.
      void setIdleReconnectInterval(int intervalSec)
      Reconnect the connector after disconnect due to idleness.
      void setIdleTimeoutMsec(long idleTimeoutMsec)
      Disconnect the connector after the specified period of inactivity.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getLogger

        protected org.slf4j.Logger getLogger()

      • notIdle

        public void notIdle()
        A "not idle" event has occurred.

        If idle timeouts have been enabled, this must be called by the connector when an event occur that qualifies as a "not idle" condition.

      • setIdleTimeoutMsec

        public void setIdleTimeoutMsec(long idleTimeoutMsec)
        Disconnect the connector after the specified period of inactivity.
        Parameters:
        idleTimeoutMsec - 0 to disable idle timeouts

      • setIdleReconnectInterval

        public void setIdleReconnectInterval(int intervalSec)
        Reconnect the connector after disconnect due to idleness.
        Parameters:
        intervalSec - delay following disconnect until reconnect. 0 to disable.

      • close

        public void close()
        To be called when the connector is being permanently closed.

      • connected

        public void connected()
        To be called when the connector has become connected.

      • disconnected

        public void disconnected(boolean wasIdle)
        To be called when the connector has become disconnected.
        Parameters:
        wasIdle - true if the disconnect was due to an idle condition.
